analyzed: vuttam ha etam bhagavatā vuttam arahatā iti me suta

original: Anavaññattipaṭisaṁyutto vitakko, lābhasakkārasilokapaṭisaṁyutto vitakko, parānuddayatāpaṭisaṁyutto vitakko.
analyzed: anavaññatti paṭisayuttaḥ vitakko lābha sakkāra siloka paṭisayuttaḥ vitakko para anuddaya tā paṭisayuttaḥ vitakko
ime kho bhikkhave tayo akusala vitakkā ati

original: Ayampi attho vutto bhagavatā, iti me sutanti.
analyzed: ayam pi atthaḥ vuttaḥ bhagavatā iti me sutam ti
